room_title: Escape room "Hallows' Eve" by Hundred Acres Manor in Pittsburgh
room_address: 1 Hundred Acres Drive Bethel Park, PA 15102
room_description:
A tribute to classic Halloween monsters, creatures and superstitions. Some stories are best untold, but some legends refuse to die. Come face-to-face with vampires, werewolves, mummies and a psychotic house wife that takes Halloween Parties WAY TO FAR!
